DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim evaluate effect combine oral contraceptive ( OC ) mood , sexuality economic behaviour randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study . 400 healthy woman randomize OC placebo period three month . Before end treatment , mood sexuality assess validated instrument . At end treatment , woman participate behavioral experiment test self-confidence , risk take altruism . The current project could fill gap ignorance causal effect OCs mood , sexuality behavior . The result might improve current practice regard information OCs , choice hormonal contraceptive , regimen duration use . As consequence , could lead reduce discontinuation rate , few unintended pregnancy abortion . The project contribute overall improvement woman 's reproductive health .
DOC.criteria: Healthy young woman , age 1835 year , BMI 1930 Risk factor thrombosis , smoking , obesity , hypertension , diabetes estrogen/gestagen therapy last three month
